title: First Hello
description: Each member shares their name, year, and one welcome cue.

title: Choose Our Ritual
description: As a pod, decide on a 10-minute weekly ritual (tea circle, study sprint, etc.).

title: Two-Step Invite
description: Each member invites one peer outside the pod to a low-stakes hangout.

title: Midday Meetup
description: For commuter pods: meet between 11:30 and 1:30 near transit or parking.

title: Oops/Ouch Practice
description: Run a 2-minute reset using the Oops/Ouch script to practice conflict repair.

title: Language Ally
description: Use a visual agenda and slower pacing once; try a translation app if needed.

title: Club Bridge
description: Attend one organization meeting or campus event together as a pod.

title: Low-Stimulus Social
description: Host a quiet meetup for half the session in a sensory-friendly space.
